title: Computer Science
description: Computer Science involves the study of computers and computational systems, including theory, design, development, and application of software and software systems.

entryLevel.description: Focus on building technical skills and gaining practical experience in the field.

midLevel.description: Take on more responsibility and begin to specialize in specific areas of expertise.

seniorLevel.description: Lead teams, make strategic decisions, and mentor junior professionals.

executiveLevel.description: Shape organizational strategy and drive innovation at the highest levels.

certifications.name: AWS Certified Solutions Architect
certifications.description: Validates expertise in designing distributed systems on AWS.

title: Electrical Engineering
description: Electrical Engineering focuses on the study and application of electricity, electronics, and electromagnetism to design and develop electrical systems and equipment.

entryLevel.description: Focus on building technical skills and understanding industry standards.

midLevel.description: Lead small projects and specialize in specific areas of electrical engineering.

seniorLevel.description: Oversee complex projects and provide technical leadership.

executiveLevel.description: Set technical direction and strategy for the organization.

certifications.name: Certified Electrical Safety Professional
certifications.description: Certification in electrical safety standards and practices.

title: Medicine
description: Medicine involves the study, diagnosis, treatment, and prevention of disease and injury in humans through the application of scientific knowledge and clinical practice.

entryLevel.description: Complete internship and gain foundational clinical experience.

midLevel.description: Specialize in a specific field of medicine through residency programs.

seniorLevel.description: Practice as a specialist and take on leadership roles in healthcare institutions.

executiveLevel.description: Lead healthcare institutions and shape healthcare policy.

certifications.name: Medical License
certifications.provider: Kenya Medical Practitioners and Dentists Council
certifications.description: Required license to practice medicine in Kenya.

certifications.name: Specialty Board Certification
certifications.description: Certification in medical specialties like surgery, pediatrics, etc.
